    • Uses of ManagedBuffer in org.jgrapes.io.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.io.events with type parameters of type ManagedBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Read<T extends ManagedBuffer<?>>
      This event signals that a new chunk of data has successfully been obtained from some source.
      class  Write<T extends ManagedBuffer<?>>
      This event signals that a new chunk of data is to be forwarded to the destination.

    • Uses of ManagedBuffer in org.jgrapes.io.util

      Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util with type parameters of type ManagedBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedBufferQueue<W extends ManagedBuffer<T>,T extends java.nio.Buffer>
      A queue based buffer pool.
      Subclasses of ManagedBuffer in org.jgrapes.io.util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedByteBuffer
      A specialized ManagedBuffer<ByteBuffer> that provides the same methods as ByteBuffer by delegating to the backing buffer.
      class  ManagedCharBuffer
      A specialized ManagedBuffer<CharBuffer> that provides the same methods as CharBuffer by delegating to the backing buffer.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.io.util with parameters of type ManagedBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BufferCollector.recollect(ManagedBuffer<?> buffer)
      Recollect the buffer.
      void ManagedBufferQueue.recollect(ManagedBuffer<?> buffer)
      Re-adds the buffer to the pool.
